about.summary: Liquid tag for displaying GitHub Gists in Jekyll sites.

name: rb-jekyll-gist
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "jekyll-gist" %}
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 495b6483552a3e2975a2752964ea7acddd545bc6e13ce2be15a50cec8d4c9f0f

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby
    - rb-octokit >=4.2,<5

test:
  requires:
    - rb-jekyll >=3.0,<4
  commands:
    - ruby -r jekyll -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE.txt
  summary: Liquid tag for displaying GitHub Gists in Jekyll sites.

  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/jekyll/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
